title: The Card For You
detail_text: <:th_ch0101/>Rudolph, the Red-Nosed Reindeer~ 𝅘𝅥𝅮<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>You’re in a good mood, Chika.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Ah, Umi-chan! Hey, look at the cards I’m making for everyone. What do you think?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>I don’t want to see it!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Whaaaat!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>It would be a spoiler if I see them in advance. You have to surprise me.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Oh, you’re right. Hehehe, sorry. I wonder if it’ll snow on Christmas~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>Hmm, I’ve heard that statistically, there aren’t that many white Christmases here......<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>If there was a white Christmas, I would make a......<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>Stop! Stop! No spoilers! You’re ruining the surprise!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
